1.title: The Final Climb
1.plot: A brave hunter is undeterred by a fatal diagnosis of cancer as he looks to fulfill a lifelong quest by completing the North American grand slam of sheep.

2.title: Nebraskan Plains and Zambian Jungles
2.plot: We travel from the plains of Nebraska to the jungle of Zambia, in this intercontinental episode. World class sable are on the docket in Africa, while a more traditional North American turkey hunt is underway, with youth hunters in Nebraska.

3.title: New Zealand Dreams
3.plot: It's a father and son trip of a lifetime, as Brad and Matt Severs, pursue world class big game in New Zealand.

4.title: Tales from the Zambezi River
4.plot: Chris Dorsey travels deep into the jungles of Zambia to hunt sable with Pete Fisher - and along the way learns of the Fisher family history in the region dating back to the abolitionist era.

5.title: Great Companions Young and Old
5.plot: Iconic broadcaster Tom Brokaw shares a flats boat with Chris Dorsey as they fly fish for bone-fish, then Chris travels to the Alaskan tundra to hunt barren ground caribou with his son Nate.

6.title: Saving Salmon
6.plot: Chris Dorsey and Wild Salmon Center's Guido Rahr fish for unbelievable salmon and rainbow trout in Bristol Bay, Alaska and discuss why we need to protect this priceless fishery from a potential dam project.

7.title: Add a Dash of Partridge
7.plot: It is a European-style driven bird hunt in the heartland of America, as Chris and Luke Dorsey hunt partridge and pheasant in Idaho. They are training the family dog Dash to be a world-class birder...as all three Dorseys are put to work.

1.title: Cover Story
1.plot: The good folks at Covey Rise magazine invited us along to do a behind the scenes show on their cover story shoot and interview with famed newsman Tom Brokaw.

2.title: Lucky Charm
2.plot: The climax of a 3 year odyssey to bag a big tom mountain lion.

3.title: Lords of the Flies
3.plot: Ram Outdoorsman host, Chris Dorsey and friend Matt Connolly head back to Canada and fling flies for gargantuan 'gators.

17.title: Farris in Paradise
17.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

18.title: Newfie Two-fer
18.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

10.title: A Wingshooter's Best Friend
10.plot: Host Chris Dorsey invites friends Alistair McLain and Christopher Merritt to the famed Wynfield Plantation for a traditional Georgia bobwhite quail hunt.

11.title: The Ultimate Cast & Blast
11.plot: It's a tour de force of angling and wingshooting as host Chris Dorsey and Matt Connolly fish for salmon and trout at the iconic Bristol Bay Lodge, then migrate south to hunt clouds of mallards at Charlie Potter's Sand Springs Ranch.

12.title: Getting the One That Got Away
12.plot: Last year, Tom Behunin lived through a deer hunter's nightmare - he saw the mule deer of a lifetime after he filled his tag. This season, he returns to The Rackett in western Nebraska for another chance at the monster mule nicknamed "Larry Bird.''

16.title: Moose Tracks in Newfoundland
16.plot: Shane Jones knows the remote wilderness of Newfoundland is perfect for finding a big bull moose, but bad weather, harsh terrain, and miles of open country will test his expertise as a hunter.

17.title: Bluegrass Quail
17.plot: Three bird hunting addicts reconvene in Kentucky for good times and falling feathers as Chris Dorsey, Steve Farris and Steve Smith work with a world class team of dogs for an unforgettable upland hunt.

imdb.plot outline: From the mountains to the marshes and all points in between, hosts Chris Dorsey and Gerald McRaney enjoy first class hunting and fishing adventure in Ram Outdoorsman. It's about overcoming challenges, hunting harder than ever, and uncovering the greatest rewards the sport has to offer. Along the way we'll learn that the success of a hunter is really about what he gives back to the sport, what he takes from the field. It's about living in the moment of a hunt, dreaming about future adventures, and honoring those who came before us to create this uniquely American outdoor culture and spirit. Ram Outdoorsman drives to new heights in outdoor adventure television.
imdb.title: Ram Outdoorsman
plot: From the mountains to the marshes and all points in between, hosts Chris Dorsey and Gerald McRaney enjoy first class hunting and fishing adventure in _Ram Outdoorsman_ (qv). It's about overcoming challenges, hunting harder than ever, and uncovering the greatest rewards the sport has to offer. Along the way we'll learn that the success of a hunter is really about what he gives back to the sport, what he takes from the field. It's about living in the moment of a hunt, dreaming about future adventures, and honoring those who came before us to create this uniquely American outdoor culture and spirit. _Ram Outdoorsman_ (qv) drives to new heights in outdoor adventure television.::Outdoor Channel
